comments:
I have a quite large project (Java) and want to duplicate it from withing the 
package explorer. I mark the project, use "copy", "paste". Eclipse asks for a 
new name. I type in, press OK. Eclipse runs for a few seconds, then shows a 
message box "Copy Problems -- Exception running validator code. -- OK". Actually 
the copy is not performed, but theres is this entry in the .metainf/.log file.

It seems as if the VSS plugin I am using is the originator, but maybe the 
problem might be in the Eclipse core, so I am reporting this problem for safety.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 Nov 19, 2003 09:07:36.568
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.
resources".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.vssplugin.VSSPlugin.getShell(VSSPlugin.java:296)
	at org.vssplugin.core.VSSPluginProvider.
loadConfiguration(VSSPluginProvider.java:942)
	at org.vssplugin.core.VSSPluginProvider.
restoreConfiguration(VSSPluginProvider.java:802)
	at org.vssplugin.core.VSSPluginProvider.
getMappingManager(VSSPluginProvider.java:1143)
	at org.vssplugin.core.VSSPluginProvider.isManaged(VSSPluginProvider.java:
696)
	at org.vssplugin.core.FileModificationValidator.
getDefaultStatus(FileModificationValidator.java:80)
	at org.vssplugin.core.FileModificationValidator.
validateSave(FileModificationValidator.java:234)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.FileModificationValidatorManager.
validateSave(FileModificationValidatorManager.java:104)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace$6.run(Workspace.java:2116)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.
java:1006)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:413)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.validateSave(Workspace.
java:2122)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.File.setContents(File.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.
internalWrite(FileSystemResourceManager.java:259)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.writeDescription(Project.
java:906)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.writeDescription(Project.
java:893)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.internalCopy(Project.java:
470)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.copy(Project.java:181)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.CopyProjectAction$1.execute(CopyProjectAction.
java:156)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.
run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1595)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.
run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.
run(ModalContext.java:101)

I agree this bug is coming from VSS plugin.  I suggest contacting the owner of
that plugin.
